translations.text: Yaa-qawmi innamaa haazihil hayaatud dunyaa mataa'unw Wa-innal Aakhirata hiya daarul qaraar

translations.text: Wa-yaa-qawmi maa leee ad'ookum ilan najaati Wa-tad'oonaneee ilan Naar

words.en: And He shows you||His Signs||Then which||(of the) Signs||(of) Allah||will you deny

translations.text: Wa-yureekum Aayaatihee fa-ayya Aayaatil laahi tunkiroon

words.id: apakah maka tidak||mereka berjalan||di muka||bumi||lalu mereka memperhatikan||bagaimana||adalah||akibat||orang-orang yang||dari||sebelum mereka||adalah mereka||lebih banyak||daripada mereka||dan lebih hebat||kekuatan||dan bekas-bekas||di muka||bumi||maka tidak||berguna||bagi mereka||apa||yang adalah mereka||mereka usahakan
words.en: Do they not||travel||through||the land||and see||how||was||(the) end||(of) those who||(were) before them||(were) before them||They were||more numerous||than them||and mightier||(in) strength||and impressions||in||the land||but not||availed||them||what||they used (to)||earn

translations.text: Afalam yaseeroo fil ardi fa-yanzuroo kaifa kaana aaqibatul lazeena min qablihim; kaanoo aksara minhum Wa-ashadda quwwatanw Wa-aasaaran fil ardi famaaa aghnaa 'anhum maa kaanoo yaksiboon

words.id: maka tatkala||datang kepada mereka||rasul-rasul mereka||dengan keterangan yang nyata||mereka bergembira||dengan apa||di sisi mereka||daripada||ilmu pengetahuan||dan mengepung||pada mereka||apa (azab)||adalah mereka||dengannya||mereka memperolok-olok
words.en: Then when||came to them||their Messengers||with clear proofs||they rejoiced||in what||they had||of||the knowledge||and enveloped||them||what||they used (to)||[at it]||mock

translations.text: Falammaa jaaa'at-hum Rusuluhum bilbaiyinaati farihoo bimaa indahum minal ilmi Wa-haaqa bihim maa kaanoo bihee yastahzi'oon

words.id: maka tatkala||mereka melihat||azab Kami||mereka berkata||kami beriman||kepada Allah||sendiri-Nya||dan kami ingkar||dengan apa||adalah kami||dengan-Nya||orang-orang yang mempersekutukan
words.en: So when||they saw||Our punishment||they said||We believe||in Allah||Alone||and we disbelieve||in what||we used (to)||with Him||associate

translations.text: Falammaa ra-aw baasanaa qaalooo aamannaa billaahi wahdahoo Wa-kafarnaa bimaa kunnaa bihee mushrikeen

words.id: maka tidak ada||adalah||berguna bagi mereka||iman mereka||tatkala||mereka melihat||azab Kami||sunnah/ketetapan||Allah||yang||sungguh||telah berlaku||pada||hamba-hamba-Nya||dan rugi||di waktu itu||orang-orang yang kafir
words.en: But did not||But did not||benefit them||their faith||when||they saw||Our punishment||(Such is the) Way||(of) Allah||which||(has) indeed||preceded||among||His slaves||And are lost||there||the disbelievers

translations.text: Falam yaku yanfa-'uhum eemaanuhum lammaa ra-aw ba'sana sunnatal laahil latee qad khalat fee ibaadihee Wa-khasira hunaalikal kaafiroon
